results.content:
Hello there, 

I am really disappointed with this course.

It contains some content, but nothing substantial , some YouTube videos have better contents.

This course does not really help you to create a website, it is very confusing, and it is not well explained.

I do not recommend this course, don’t waste your time and money.
results.content_html:
Hello there,

I am really disappointed with this course.

It contains some content, but nothing substantial , some YouTube videos have better contents.

This course does not really help you to create a website, it is very confusing, and it is not well explained.

I do not recommend this course, don’t waste your time and money.

results.content: For free it would be 5 stars; however, it was not free (even though it says it was free in the last lesson), it was $12.99.  Still, at 4.5 it was well worth the 12.99 because it hits all the basics in 3 hours, which is crazy. I didn't think it would be this good for being so short.
